Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement referral program and improvements

## Referral Program \(Programa de Indica癟繭es\)
- Backend: Complete referral module with services for:
  - Code generation and validation
  - Multi-method attribution \(code, clickId, install referrer, fingerprint\)
  - Anti-fraud detection \(self-referral, same email, velocity, same IP\)
  - Rewards processing \(1 month per referral, 12 months at milestone 10\)
  - Audit logging for all actions
  - 124 unit and integration tests

- Web: Dashboard and landing pages
  - /referral - User dashboard with stats and share buttons
  - /r/[code] - Landing page for referral links
  - Sidebar navigation integration

- Mobile: ReferralService with deep linking support
  - Handle app scheme and web URL deep links
  - Deferred deep link resolution for iOS
  - Indica癟繭es screen in profile

## Other improvements
- Billing: Payment gateway abstraction and Stripe support
- Database: New migration for referral tables
